title: Never Make Me Use VISTA Again
description: My original 2007 laptop with Windows Vista started the channel...but nah this can stay in the past Check out @psivewri's Vista powered Acer Aspire 3680   The HOT PEPPER Gaming PC Build Challenge     Microsoft's really useful Windows 10 USB tool:   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
